jd: Hello, Hope you are doing well today! My name is Ajay Reddy, and I am a senior recruiter working with ITech US Inc. If you are currently looking for new opportunities. I have an exciting opportunity with one of our clients in Foster City, CA (Hybrid). Please let me know if you are interested. Below are the job details for your review. Note: Need only be Local to Foster City, CA Candidates Role: Senior Business Analyst – (Life Science Domain)Location: Foster City, CA (Hybrid)Duration: Long term ContractJob Description:8+ years of Business Analysis / Solutioning / Project Management experience 4+ years Pharma experience Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills Action-oriented creative thinker and problem solver The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions.Experience in Pharma and GxP compliance / 21 CFR Part 11 / / Biologics Manufacturing, Quality, LabSenior customer-facing role responsible for discovering and analyzing business needs and business processes to guide application of IT technology solutions to business needsRole Summary: Senior Business Analyst helps achieve business goals by analyzing business needs, business processes, and application of IT technology to business needs. Through analysis and critical thinking identify areas or risk or inefficiencies for improvement and provide recommendations to fill in gaps and improve business processes and structures, which include technology, people, organizational, and technological structures. The role often bridges technical teams and business departments so they can work together to achieve the functional specifications required to meet business needs.
